title: Project disruption
body:
So unfortunately as we all know project disruption as of yesterday came to an end but as some of us may know the we still have unused project cores, blueprints and argument cache fragments so the question I am asking is WHAT THE HELL DO WE DO WITH THEM because I have 6 cores and you need 7 and I still have both Ashe and Katarina blueprints and 2 argument cache fragments and there is no option to disenchant them so are they meant to now just sit there forever or until they decide to release more project skins ? Because I really wish to know can someone please let me know Hopefully a member of riot could let me know what to do with them 

Thanks

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266

 "WHAT HAPPENS TO MY BLUEPRINTS AND CORES WHEN THE EVENT IS OVER?
All PROJECT content will stay in your Hextech Crafting inventory once the event is over. If you prefer a tidy inventory, you'll be able to disenchant all PROJECT materials into a little bit of essence."

That's all I can find. Don't know what type of essences and they haven't enabled it yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Algido,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ETza66Jj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-18T07:32:02.263+0000)
>
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266
> 
>  "WHAT HAPPENS TO MY BLUEPRINTS AND CORES WHEN THE EVENT IS OVER?
> All PROJECT content will stay in your Hextech Crafting inventory once the event is over. If you prefer a tidy inventory, you'll be able to disenchant all PROJECT materials into a little bit of essence."
> 
> That's all I can find. Don't know what type of essences and they haven't enabled it yet.

It'll be Orange Essence, and the feature should be enabled in the near future.
